item.name: Get Flight Requests Detail By Approver

request.description:
# Usage description:
Get particular flight request detail

|param|type|desc|sample|
|:--|:--|:--|:--|
|aircraftType|string|aircraft type (display only)|A330-300|
|originDesc|string|origin name|Hong Kong|
|destinationDesc|string|destination name|Beijing|

|> paxName|string|passengers name|Mk JSDK sdjsf|
